full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI PA'I CHO GA DPAG BSAM SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES SGROL MA MAndAL BZHI PA'I CHO GA DPAG BSAM SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA DAM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA'I DGONGS DON GTZO BOR BZUNG CHOS RJE KUN DGA' TSUL KHRIMS DANG, ,BLA MA DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO GNYIS MDZAD PA'I YI GE NAS KYANG CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG STE, ,RANG BZHIN GYI NYAMS SU LEN DU, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS DBEN GNAS THAR PA RTZER SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR RO,, ,,)
